oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Saint Louis Blues
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Handy, W. C.; music; sheet music; jazz; St. Louis, Missouri;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The cover of the sheet music to W. C. Handy's "The St. Louis Blues." Also known as "The International Melody." The cover shows a beautiful shot of the city of St. Louis, MO.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Handy, W. C.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: W. C. Handy Beale Street Collection
